typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviescsv
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> moviesdb
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesparquet
moviescsv, moviesdb join(moviescsv@movie == moviesdb@movie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1, moviesparquet join(toInteger(moviescsv@movie) == MovieId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		movie = moviescsv@movie,
		title = moviescsv@title,
		year = moviescsv@year,
		Rating = moviescsv@Rating,
		movie = moviesdb@movie,
		year = moviesdb@year,
		Rating = moviesdb@Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		dateOfETL,
		MovieIdDupe,
		ActionDupe,
		MovieId,
		Genre,
		Rating = moviesparquet@Rating,
		RottenTom,
		Action
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(movieagg = movie),
	each(match(true()), $$ = first(toString($$)))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
